feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
